comment.author: 65361386@N05
comment._content: I think there's more going on here than electioneering!

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: Mmm, looks as if a row is about to break out alright, but not entirely convinced that it's genuine. There's something a little staged about this shot. What do you think?
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 65361386@N05
comment._content: I know what you mean, but I think if it was staged, it would look even more stagey - if you know what I mean. The figures moving on the left look pretty random, and the main man with his back to us does look in motion. Whatever's going on, it's fascinating - the policeman looks like he's being held back by the elderly man, who's being held back by the girl...
